entry.title: BLIZZARD WARNING , Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 12:50 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Blizzard near the Richardson mountains early this evening. Wind east 30 km/h gusting to 50 except 70 gusting to 90 near the Richardson mountains early this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 29 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High minus 21. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 21. Wind chill minus 27 in the morning and minus 32 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Mainly cloudy. Low minus 27.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill near minus 33. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 06 February 2023
